sentences.en: A fresh cascade of splintered glass tinkled to the floor.
sentences.cn: 大量刚裂开的玻璃碎片落到地板上，发出清脆的响声。

sentences.en: And the tinkle clink of silverware on china , the hiss and gurgle of the coffee maker.
sentences.cn: 还有陶瓷上银器的清脆的叮当声, 咖啡壶的斯斯声和汩汩声.

sentences.en: As Archer rang the bell, the long tinkle seemed to echo through a mausoleum.
sentences.cn: 当阿切尔拉门铃时, 那久久的铃声好似陵墓里的回声.

sentences.en: From brightly lit windows came the tinkle of laughter and the sound of singing.
sentences.cn: 从明亮的窗户传来了笑声叮当声和歌声.

sentences.en: Give me a tinkle and let me know what time the show starts.
sentences.cn: 给我打个电话,告诉我演出什么时候开始.

sentences.en: Give me a tinkle when you get home.
sentences.cn: 你一到家就给我打个电话.

sentences.en: Give me Bach and Beethoven, not these modern crashing - tinkle composers.
sentences.cn: 给我一些巴哈与贝多芬作品, 不要这些当代的喧嚣音乐作曲家的.

sentences.en: I'll give you a tinkle tonight.
She heard the faint tinkle of water, as the tiny overflow trickled over and downhill.
sentences.cn: 她听着溢出的水, 流在山坡上,发着叮略的细微声.

sentences.en: She heard the tinkle of the broken lens.
sentences.cn: 她听到透镜当啷一声撞碎了.
玻璃破碎发出的当啷声

sentences.en: The wine glass dropped to the floor with a tinkle.
sentences.cn: 酒杯丁零一声掉在地上.

sentences.en: There was a crash and tinkle of breaking glass.
We strolled past tinkling fountains and perfumed gardens.
sentences.cn: 我们漫步走过发出清脆声音的喷泉和香气四溢的花园。

words.tran_cn: 发出丁当声；发出丁零声

trans.tran_cn: 丁当声，铃铃声，<英><口>一次电话

trans.tran_en: to make light ringing sounds, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 叮当响着发出，铃铃响着报出
